column1: It was founded in 1750 as the village of Petrovskoye (Петро́вское). It was granted town status and renamed Svetlograd in 1965.

column2: Svetlograd serves as the administrative center of Petrovsky District. As an administrative division
column5: incorporated within Petrovsky District as the Town of Svetlograd. As a municipal division
column6: the Town of Svetlograd is incorporated within Petrovsky Municipal District as Svetlograd Urban Settlement.
